class  CPuzzleGraphModel
 CPuzzleGraphModel. More...

Detailed Description

Author: Bob Buehler and Matt Dissinger

Compiler: Windows: MinGW / Linux: GNU G++

Project: GNAT

Description: This file contains the declaration of the CPuzzleGraphModel class which is a wrapper for the CPuzzleGraph class. It is designed to allow for notification of data modification by requiring that all data modification be done through this class.
